data.title: ENECO records
data.meta_description: Archives West provides access to descriptions of primary sources in the western United States, including correspondence, diaries, and photographs. Digital reproductions of primary sources are available in some cases. Archives West was formerly known as the Northwest Digital Archives (NWDA).
data.text:
Patents

Documents in this subseries will be organized, first, by patents with major inventors in alphabetical order followed by compiled patents and patent binders. Documents included in folders include patent applications, correspondence, and general material regarding the patent.

Contracts

This subseries begins with general licenses and agreements that are alphabetically organized and are followed by contract summaries and contracts related to the University of Utah. Final documents in the subseries are expired contracts (alphabetically organized) and DARPA contracts (chronologically organized).
